title: Romantic Short Stories by Spring Hellams
description: If you've been missing the characters from Spring Hellams' books, please enjoy three new stories with characters from her first three novels: 'The League of Ascenders, Journey of the Fledglings'; 'The Light of Xander'; and 'The Road to Narrow Gate'.Three new, short and sweet love stories for your reading pleasure await. Fox and Aliza will delight you with fiery disputes that lead to tender promises; Sloane and Caris will tantalize you with tempting gazes and eager embraces; and Vaughn and Brandolyn will enchant you as they ride horses by the moonlight.So steal away to your favorite reading nook with a steaming mug of your favorite comfort drink and prepare for your trip to The Landing, The Gathering Place, and The Narrow Gate-your wholesome yet juicy destinations for love.
author: Spring Dalton
